page.title: 16WHITACRE PLAYSCHOOL
page.content: The Playschool was opened in the Methodist Church in Sept 1966_ this is still the venue. Meetings were on Tuesdays & Fridays, now they are on Mondays, Wednesdays & Fridays (9.15_ 11.45 am). A small charge is made for attendance. In January 1976 children were accepted at 2 years 9 months if accompanied by their mother, formerly the age had been 3 years. As from September 1985 the age is to be lowered to 2 years. The Playschool is registered to take 20 children _at one time the numbers went down to 4. The activities include experience with different media. The children have an annual outing and several smaller outings. Originally the playgroup had 2 supervisors, now there is 1 supervisor and a mother to help.
